name: WoPo Paint
author: WoPo Web

sections.description:
Windows 95, 98, and XP were the golden years of paint. You had a tool box and a color box, a foreground color and a background color, and that was all you needed.

You can add shortcode [wopo-paint] to page you want to show editor
You can edit your images on your Media Library Attachment details New Feature

WoPo Paint Pro

  1. Post drawing image as comment
  2. Open Painter with feature image or post images
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wopo-paint directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->General screen to configure the plugin
  4. Copy Designer URL on WoPo Paint Settings Section
  5. Add your custom link menu with Designer URL.

or add shortcode [wopo-paint] to page you want to show painter
sections.faq:
